description:
- Proposed alterations to the lower ground floor including: lowering the existing floor level up to the existing foundation depth (TBC); replacement of the glazing arrangement to the rear elevation; alterations to the rear garden layout and stairs; Replacing the external staircase to the front lightwell; internal reconfigurations. 
- Proposed alterations to the ground floor including: Erection of a lightweight conservatory style extension at rear elevation, replacing the external stairs to the rear garden, replacing non-original internal staircase to lower ground floor to match existing.  
- Proposed internal reconfigurations to the first, second and third floors and proposed amendments to the closet wing windows and door. 
- Proposed closet wing extension with new flat roof and rear window to the third floor and a new openable roof light over the main staircase.
